Song.title: You Are My Everything
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Eric Hughes Â© 2000 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [D]I can[D2]not [D]thank You e[D2]nough for sa[Bm]ving me [A | D/F# G |] [D]I can[D2]not [D]love You e[D2]nough for the cr[Bm A | D/F# G |]oss [D]I can[D2]not [D]think e[D2]nough ab[G]out You, [| G | Em D/F# G |]Jesus
Chorus: [A] [ ]For You are my e[Em7 D/F# G |]v'rything [A] [ ]For You are my e[Em7 D/F# G |]verything, [A] [ ]Jes[Bm A | D/F# G | Bm A D/F# | G |]us
Verse 2: [D]I can[D2]not im[D]agine my [D2]life with[Bm]out You [A | D/F# G |] [D]How I [D2]love to [D]be near to [D2]You, my S[Bm]avior [A | D/F# G |] Your [D]mercy [D2]sweet, Your [D]presence is [D2]real all ar[G]ound me, [| G Bm A | Em D/F# G |]Jesus
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 i cannot thank you enough for saving me i cannot love you enough for the cross i cannot think enough about you jesus chorus for you are my evrything for you are my everything jesus verse 2 i cannot imagine my life without you how i love to be near to you my savior your mercy sweet your presence is real all around me jesus
